div.p: Ottawa-Glandorf Local Schools is working diligently to continue learning through this state wide school closure. Assignments will be posted and submitted digitally through Schoology during this time. Teachers will communicate expectations of students and families by next Tuesday via email to parents. This will include online accounts and password information to assist you with access.

Families that do not have access to technology devices in their homes for students to complete assignments, should contact their building office on Monday to arrange device pick up. Final Forms information MUST be current and up-to-date by Monday to ensure we have correct email addresses and contact information.
